p: There were nine treatment-related deaths in the study, one in the Ad5-infected vehicle-treated group and eight in the Ad6-infected vehicle-treated group ( Figure 1A). VGCV treatment prevented mortality in both the Ad5- and Ad6-infected VGCV-treated groups, and no deaths occurred in either of the uninfected groups. Hamsters in both of the Ad-infected untreated groups were losing weight from the onset of the study ( Figure 1B). VGCV treatment completely reversed body weight loss for both Ad5- and Ad6-challenged hamsters ( Figure 1B). No animals in the uninfected groups lost weight during the study ( Figure 1B).
